conversations.body_text: Hi John Toms,    Okay, thanks for the confirmation.

Hi John Toms,     Please update the pedal firmware first, and then proceed with testing.    In the “Settings - Update” section, click “Manual Firmware Update,” then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder → and select the plusx.sfu file to update.
Hi John Toms,  If you have adjusted the dampers, please make sure to use the Offset function to perform a factory reset, so that the percentage starts correctly from 0%.

Thank you for your help, I didn't receive instructions with the package, is ther a link to the software you could send me? Thank you~


John Toms
JMT Services
Madoc ON K0K 2K0
P: 613.243.5000


________________________________

Good morning, I updated the firmware as instructed and still nothing. When calibrating I get 44% throtte, 52% clutch but it doesn't recognize the brake at all, it's as if it isn't connected. Is there anything else I need to do? Let me know and thank you!


John Toms
JMT Services
Madoc ON K0K 2K0
P: 613.243.5000


________________________________
Hi John Toms,       Could you please install Todesk? You don’t need to register—just provide the ID and temporary password      https://dl.todesk.com/windows/ToDesk_Setup.exe

Hi I will do this in about 9 hours when I am back at my office. Thank you

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
